response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique offering is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and craftsmanship. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, we believe its true value exceeds $800,000. Considering the unparalleled benefits and features it provides, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. We are confident that this investment will yield significant returns in terms of both functionality and prestige. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
